rawValue: Almost all life insurance applications are subject to an underwriting process in which the insurance company assesses the risk involved in insuring the applicant

source.extractedValue: Almost all life insurance applications are subject to an underwriting process in which the insurance company assesses the risk involved in insuring the applicant

context.surroundingText: The phrase 'subject to underwriting' refers to life insurance applications that undergo a risk assessment process. According to Guardian's explanation, 'Almost all life insurance applications are subject to an underwriting process in which the insurance company assesses the risk involved in insuring the applicant.'

rawValue: Applicants must sign HIPAA-compliant consent forms authorizing access to personal data

source.extractedValue: Applicants must sign HIPAA-compliant consent forms authorizing access to personal data

context.surroundingText: Applicants must sign HIPAA-compliant consent forms authorizing access to personal data. The document emphasizes that honest disclosures are critical—misstatements could jeopardize approval or potentially void the policy upon death.

rawValue: honest disclosures are critical—misstatements could jeopardize approval or potentially void the policy upon death

source.elementRef: Key Disclosure Requirements section - Consequences statement
source.extractedValue: honest disclosures are critical—misstatements could jeopardize approval or potentially void the policy upon death

rawValue: the quote is provisional and dependent on successful completion of the underwriting process

source.extractedValue: the quote is provisional and dependent on successful completion of the underwriting process

context.surroundingText: When an insurance provider includes 'subject to underwriting' on a quotation, it indicates the quote is provisional and dependent on successful completion of the underwriting process.

rawValue: protects both parties—it acknowledges the quote isn't binding until medical assessment is complete, giving the insurer time to verify risk factors while allowing applicants to understand final terms before commitment

source.extractedValue: protects both parties—it acknowledges the quote isn't binding until medical assessment is complete

context.surroundingText: The 'subject to underwriting' language protects both parties—it acknowledges the quote isn't binding until medical assessment is complete, giving the insurer time to verify risk factors while allowing applicants to understand final terms before commitment.

rawValue: the process insurers use to determine the risks of insuring your small business

source.extractedValue: the process insurers use to determine the risks of insuring your small business

context.surroundingText: The article defines underwriting as: 'the process insurers use to determine the risks of insuring your small business.'
